lines.text: Well, that would've worked. The first one was an 11 plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. One under. You go to Counterspell, but the image of its head, and seeing Pike wounded, it's too much for you and your hand shakes and you can't manage to clarify the Dispel Magic, as the whole sphinx vanishes and appears right next to Pike. All right. That brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I try to make my wisdom save before I do anything, or does that come at the end?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Then I'm going to come around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not in your sight, by the way, you don't see it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. Can I walk over, yeah, ten feet that way and see it scowling down at Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah, around the edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And put three daggers in its flank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one misses, it's a 13. 24. And a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 13, 24, 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Middle one hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight. Eight points of damage. I'm going to try to shake off the fear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points. It does get sneak attack because it's adjacent to Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But am I at disadvantage because of the fear? I thought I was at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're at disadvantage to all the attacks, yeah. Wait, I'm sorry. I thought those were your three attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did three attack rolls, but I thought that to get sneak attack damage I need advantage, but if I'm afraid, I don't have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but Pike's still adjacent. That's one of the ways you can get sneak attack, is either having advantage or an ally's adjacent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Added to what I said before, which was eight, so 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33. So one dagger, two of them you throw and they vanish into the cyclone, consumed and thankfully return with magic or they would be gone for good. Third one you throw. It stabs into the shank of the sphinx, who growls, turns back to Pike. All right, is that your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what I rolled, so I'm going to roll again. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. You manage to finally shake off the fear. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use the rest of my movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to run up to the side of the sphinx.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're there. All righty. Now produces two spiders. Jump out of the web. Both of them, the only thing they see, rush up to Vex. That is a natural 20 and a two. (laughs) So the second one misses you, first one you take 16 points of psychic damage, and that one vanishes on the impact. All right. That ends their turn. Up to the top, Vex, it's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, what did you see?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I respond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say make a wisdom saving throw. At the sight of what you've done to Pike and all that is happening, this is to see if you can shake from the stupor of what has happened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not responsive right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I-- Jesus. Can I bring Trinket out? That's stupid. If I, well, I'm going to go and try to see what's going on over there with the sphinx.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you rush over right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, you can see Grog. As you rush around the corner, you can see the sphinx there, you see Pike with Craven Edge partially embedded in her abdomen, the chain now lax, as Grog is standing on the outside of the portal holding it in his hand, his eyes wide. The rage has faded now, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I run forward and cast Cure Wounds on Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's Pike!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got a fucking sword in her! Can I help her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could cast Cure Wounds if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, does she still have a sword through her, can I pull her off of it and then cast it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sword is still inside of her right now, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't do damage to yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check. Roll a d20, add your strength modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I-- oh, natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for the one who normally can't find the physical strength of activities like this, through the inspiration of seeing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It reminds me of what happened to Pike before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And that clear image crystallizes in your mind of when that glabrezu snatched her from you once. And with that, you find the strength to persevere, you reach out and grabbing the jagged blade take nine points of necrotic damage in touching the outside of the blade, but you pull, you can see the blood forming at the edge of your fingers as you yank it outside of Pike's body, and it clatters to the ground at the base of Grog's feet. Grog's still seeing this all before you, eyes wide open, mouth agape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, snap out of it! And I cast Cure Wounds on Pike's stomach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what level?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Level three. So 3d8 plus, I think it's-- what's your modifier for wisdom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 3d8 plus three. And that will end Vex's turn. Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I roll to see if I'm fearful?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be the end of your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I'm going to, as a bonus action, cast Healing Words on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Okay, good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll heal myself at level two. 2d4 plus five. Okay. Seven points, great. And then for my action I'll Dimension Door into the tornado.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourself on the outside of the wind before it grabs you and pulls you in. You step through a portal and you're now drifting out in an expanse of air and cloud. There's no up, there's no down, there's no left or right, you see various masses of land slowly rotating in place as you see different gusts of wind floating about. You drift by and see a single stone that has carvings on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dammit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did this to yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you have no anchor and you are drifting away from the opening you came through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my action and my bonus. I have no movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, so you were--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm gonna just do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do that. There's, it's air, you're still drifting away. All right. That brings us to the top of the initiative round. Let's see. For this one, I need everyone in the room to go ahead and make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So ready for a nap. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. Vex, what'd you get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I use my fire elemental constitution? 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Okay. Pike makes it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So hard to get these last two fucking letters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you rolled a 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not terribly, but a little more than usual. Your body's now starting to feel the wear of time passage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If that's happened twice, they're 20 years older.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. 25 for those who got hit before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, the first time was 25 years?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one was 15, now it's an additional ten to those who were hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The first one was 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. But as a half-elf you have a longer life, so really at age 50, you're not that far in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not huge, it's not like a major difference. You know, 25 years to a human, to Percy, would be a lot harsher than it is to you guys. It's minor differences. It is now the sphinx's turn, the sphinx is now going to (roars) roar even louder this time. This roar echoes out with a shockwave. I need everybody except for Scanlan to make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? And you were still frightened from previously, right? Because you did not shake that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I never shook it, still in a rage, but never shook it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But your rage ended.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You dropped the rage. All right. Pike. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Vax, suddenly as the blast hits, the fear hits you again as the sound vanishes and you can't hear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's nothing. You are completely deafened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deafened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As are you and Pike. However, because you were previously frightened, you find your muscles tense up and you are both paralyzed as well. You cannot move, you cannot speak, you cannot--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm not afraid, but I'm deaf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, it's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've both seen it, we can't say shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm floating to my death, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bugger all, I got to fix this shit. Oh, what a clusterfuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry, I still have my lips. (blows whistle) (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Great. Okay. Where is-- can you point to Vex in that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, didn't I have Freedom of Movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Vex here. You do have Freedom of Movement. So you are not currently affected by paralysis. Look at you, remembering your buffs, buddy! So the fear still hits you, and your muscles tense, but you, looking over at Pike now frozen in place, you remember everything that's transpired and that holy divine energy that she imbued upon you glows from the inside, and your muscles return to you and you're still able to function.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to turn around the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Around here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, say the bloody words!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Grog. Snap out of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine. At a disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What the fuck am I going to do? I am going to hold my turn right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, holding your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until such time as someone says the fucking letters that we need, and I'm going to be ready to yell them out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it is your turn, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Question: as a fire elemental, I can fly, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it say on the fire elemental? It should say movement: flight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It says that I can, oh, movement? It doesn't really say, it says I can move through a space as narrow as one inch wide without squeezing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, for the elemental form here, which I have a list of your elemental forms just in case. Fire elemental, speed of 50 feet. No, it cannot fly. It moves as a flame across the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't fly. So if I go into that portal I'm going to be in the same fucking situation, I'm assuming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sadly, there is only one of us who can fly, and very busy right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to drop my elemental form--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You still have my Immovable Rod?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's planted next to the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's over there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But my rope is attached to it and it's dangling next to me. I dropped it when I healed Pike. So it's right next to me, I pulled the robe over to there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the robe that produces the rope is on the ground right now next to Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, before I drop elemental form I'm going to go pick up the rod.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so I can move faster. Pick up the rod.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, and then you drop your form to grab the rope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Drop my form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're grabbing the what? The rod?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Immovable Rod.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you click the rod off. You now have the rod with the rope on the end of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And do I still have movement now as myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you-- in dropping the form, you've used most of-- I'd say you have one more square of movement left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll step forward a square.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way or this way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, the other way. Yeah, yeah. And say, Vex, catch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you throw the Immovable Rod to her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity check, easy enough for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you catch the rod, no issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, it was really close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So is that your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think so. I think that's all I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Keyleth's turn. At the end of Keyleth's turn it's going to use another legendary action. This one, it's going to go ahead and reach out and strike at you, Vex, as you're now holding the rod.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 29 to hit. You suffer 28 points of slashing damage as its giant claw rakes across the front of your body, almost tossing you off your feet from the sheer force of the blow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 28 points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points. That brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look down at Pike. Pike, buddy, are you all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've gotten your senses back now at this point. You look at her, and she's still frozen in place. She can't move and you can see the sweat's still pouring from her face. The wound has stopped bleeding, the wound is still fresh and visible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I call out, the letters inside the wind are O-R-I.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: O-R-I.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maljikaori? Maljikairi?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Karimaljika?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kaorimal?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Malkaoriji?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. What else do you want to do on your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I turn, I face the sphinx, and I don't do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Craven Edge is on the ground, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Craven Edge is on the ground, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it. That's all I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike cannot move, fails the saving throw, unfortunately is still paralyzed, still frightened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was holding my action for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what are you going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maljikaori?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No response.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, wait, before you move it, before you move it, put it back, put it back, put it back. Okay, I want to write it down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maorikalji!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The order was fire, earth, water, air. That was the circle. So it could be in any of those orders, maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got one more try before your turn's up, this is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Malkaoriji!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. That is your turn, however. In the six seconds, you shout out, you come up with and shout out those three things. That ends Percy's turn. At the end of Percy's turn, it's going to use its third legendary action to go ahead and make another strike at Vex holding the rod. 25 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes another claw and rakes you for 28 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy shouldn't have got that turn, but we'll say it happened, it's fine. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to disengage from the sphinx and I'm going to run around the whirlwind, and as I move I'm taking the rope which I already made a loop on, and I'm going to throw the loop over Grog's head on one end, and I'm going to jump into the whirlwind holding tightly-- I'm going to, into there, I'm going after Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rope clenches onto your neck and you feel like you're being choked suddenly. Without even realizing this, as you shout this out, all of a sudden a lasso is thrown around your neck and pulls back and cuts off your air supply.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chokes) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you vanish into the cyclone. The rope goes taut, pulling. You come through the portal and you can see, indeed, Scanlan's about 30 feet away and drifting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I was hasted and I ran at the whirlwind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Which is why you're gaining on him, but it's still going to take a moment as you're both still drifting, because he also leapt through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's really quiet in here. But then again it would be really quiet out of here as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. All right, so. That's going to be the end of your turn, Vax. This spider now is going to leap over as two more, or sorry, three more leap out of this. They all rush up to Keyleth, she's the one visible person there, and all making strikes against you. That is 19 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you take 12 points of psychic damage as two of the spiders dissipate, leaving nothing but a psychic mist behind. All right. Top of the turn, Vex, I need you to make a death saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six. Mark off one of your failed death saving throws. Scanlan, your turn, you're floating out in space and you see all of a sudden through the portal, Vax come rocketing towards you, hand forward, clutching a rope in one hand, arm outstretched towards you. What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, as much as I appreciate the gesture, I'm going to try to Dimension Door out of here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I deftly roll my eyes so fucking hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You Dimension Door and you appear right at the doorway. You cannot Dimension Door through dimensions. But you make your way to the outside of the door. You are still drifting with the momentum you had going backwards, so you appear back at the door and start going backwards again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I grab the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can grab the rope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't see or hear him, so I assume he is healing my sister right now, and I feel comforted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him vanish. There's the rope there that Vax is carrying. You can grab onto that and wrestle through. With that, Scanlan manages to pull himself through the portal, landing onto the side right there. And you're fine now. That's probably going to take your full action, everything to get there, but you're out--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll give you a bonus, sure, because your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Do I have time to assess and see that she's dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's doing pretty rough, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will heal her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Healing Word.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Healing Word at level--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have many levels. At level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So that's 3d4 plus five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. 3d4 plus five. Finishing up Scanlan's turn--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, it's better than zero. Thank you. I'm alive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I need everybody in the room to roll another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except for you, you're not in the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This aging thing, is it permanent forever?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll find out later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe if we ask nicely, he'll make us young again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I probably look really good with ten years on me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike succeeds. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. All right. So.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I also have to roll for fear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine. So Vex, you come to consciousness, and you age another four years.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aw, he softballed you with that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You basically just got Netflix, that's really all that happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now the sphinx's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all laughing and one of us is unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're seriously going to die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not going to die, we're doing great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're doing all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There. Next to Scanlan and Percy, two claw attacks against you. That is a 28. And 21.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use my shield to glance off the 21. I'm going to use the shield of plus five AC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Which reduces it to a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Versus AC of 23. It gives me a temporary AC of 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you got your turn last turn when you shouldn't have, but I'm letting that fly--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, because I was holding my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh sorry, you were holding it, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all part of the plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I confused myself. So yeah. Now it's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I said Jamalkaori last time, if I recall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kaorijimal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to, while I'm saying all these things I'm going to be running around the corner back towards the spiderweb. Make another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What have you said so far?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We said, Maljikaori--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maorikaji.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jimalkaori.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Kaorijimal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, okay. So. You have two more if you wanted to do anything, Taliesin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should try that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that as far as I can move right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move up to there, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I can't get any closer to the web?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for your full movement, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kamaljiori?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, all of a sudden the braziers flicker out. You notice as the wind cyclone begins to slowly drift to a minor wind curl. At this point in time, Grog, if you wanted to pull on that rope it would be a good time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I turn around and grab the thing that's strangling my neck like a dog leash and I yank it in real hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you, as you're drifting off, you turn around and see the doorway where the rope goes taut, and the door begins to close.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bye, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pulling yourself in, and suddenly you're yanked through and come shooting out of it on the side. With that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't hear you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have earned a name."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, they're deaf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It raises a paw like this, at which point all the paralysis fades, all the fear fades, all the effects fade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we young again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The age is not dispersed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no. It goes forward and looks at you, who's looking the worst for wear comparatively and says, "I can help but one of you." And his paw goes out and touches you, there's a warm glow, and the age vanishes from you. "However, that is the "extent of my magic this day. Perhaps the little one could help a few at this. It is but a rather "challenging restoration." Pike nods. "I can do that. I can do that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look at Vax and laugh at him because he's so much older than I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, oh my god, you guys are never going to experience this ever again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I apologize for the formalities, but it is a pleasure to meet you, Vox Machina."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was his name again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kamaljiori."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hazing. Who doesn't love hazing, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At about that time, I lift up my shoulder and I show him the Slayer's Take symbol.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives a nod.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't we get something out of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks to you and says, "I admire your impatience. The Vestiges that you seek. Some have "been destroyed over this epoch. Others lie scattered across the planes. Some are sealed or "hidden. Others have found an owner. You carry one now, I see." The sphinx backs up and turns around on the steps and lays down, crossing its paws, glancing at you all, shoulders high. And a smile, it's warm, it's this interesting contrast to when you first entered. "Well. I happen to carry a "Vestige here, if you will take it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, sure, if you're getting rid of it anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is most gracious of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gets up and turns around to the back of the platform. Takes the marble from beneath its fur and holds it up to one of the doorways, which switches--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dwarven Forge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Secret doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here I keep the Mythcarver."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mythcarver?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you seek the others that remain, yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very much so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fenthras, the Wrath of the Feywarden, a bow that felled Titans. It was lost in the Feywild in "the Calamity."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obviously for Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It now acts as the heart of a cancerous tree, corrupting the verdant land there. The Plate of "the Dawnmartyr, beacon of protection to the chosen of Pelor, gathers dust on a wall in the City of "Brass, a trophy won by a fire giant in a card game from a Suutan bloodline that once donned it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that called again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't worry, I wrote all these down for you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank you. I know, I'm like, there's going to be a test later!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I got this for you guys. "Cabal's Ruin, a magic-devouring cloak once used by an "assassin to eliminate the unscrupulous den of Druja. It is now worn by a merchant-warrior with a "missing eye in the walls of Ank'harel. The Spire of Conflux, a staff born from Melora's very "breath, was devoured, along with its previous owner, by a goristro named Yenk in the endless "maze of the Abyss."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The race is on." And with that, sand begins to erupt from the two piles of rubble, swirling in a giant whirlwind of blasted stone and sand, you guys have to cover your eyes as it begins to completely consume the vision around you. You see the sphinx back up towards the top of the platform before the sand consumes even within 15 feet, ten feet, five feet of your vision. You lose sight of your friends around you, and for a second the panic hits you before the sand comes to a stop and drops to the ground. Looking around, you stand at the base of the triangular cavern entrance by the mountain range where you first entered the temple. And that's where we'll end tonight's game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That got so much more intense than I ever thought it was going to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought it was going to be like a gentle education, like a gentle ribbing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I thought we'd go and talk to this guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, we're friends with your girlfriend, want to give us some stuff?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt, that was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A crazy-ass puzzle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can look at that list, so I can make some serious notes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's a list for you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll make a copy of it, I'll make a copy of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to go after all of them? We'll do it; we'll talk about it later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we each need to be outfitted with something. We need our legendary weapons, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We took the weapon off the ground before he portaled us out, right, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, actually. In which case I will give this to you as you now have access to its capabilities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fenthras? Is that what it was-- no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the Mythcarver. It's a legendary longsword. This incredible silvered blade once belonged to the White Duke himself, and many more master bards before him. It resonates with nearby musical tones. It acts as a plus three longsword, and the weapon deals an additional 1d6 force damage upon a hit. Whenever you use your Bardic Inspiration feature, you gain advantage on attacks with this weapon until the end of your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Advantage on attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you were to give somebody-- use your bonus action before your attack, you would get advantage on any attacks with the weapon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, that was made for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know, obviously. I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And whenever you use your Cutting Words feature against an enemy, the target also has disadvantage on its next saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I guess I'll have to take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a weird question I'm going to throw out there. Did you pick your sword back up before all this mess happened?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, the White Duke!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Grog looks at his feet, the blade that still laid there before you, tethered to you by chain, still remains at your feet as you see the chain amongst the sand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys for sticking around for this very long episode.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know it was long, I wanted to try and get through this before we started the 50th.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, it's midnight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sorry guys. So long. Hope we're cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) It's the last midnight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right you guys, well, thank you so much for watching. Have a good night, and is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Two more minutes.
